choices: Inside the same two story home where the party was held
In the middle of the woods
1.content:
Okay the last thing you remember before waking up is being at a party. You aren't sure how you ended up there anymore, or even where it was, but you remember walking through the door and being assaulted by rock music. Everything gets a little blurry after that, but you clearly remember grabbing a cup and going over to a keg set up in the corner and pouring yourself a beer. Beyond that first sip of beer there is nothing except a cute face wreathed in blonde hair. You still have no idea who she was though, and now you wake up here.

Well the here isn't that bad. The bad part is the fact that when you wake up you're standing at only about an inch tall. Worse still a birthmark on the inside of your arm that was just a white splotch on your skin, is now a bright red, rash-like splotch, though it doesn't itch. All of that you could live with. Hell the shrinking could even be fun. But there is one part of your current situation you just cannot accept at all.

The frilly, pink underwear. How you came to be wearing it is a mystery to you, as the rest of your clothes are still the exact same ones you had on the night before. All except for that pair of panties. Even the beer stain on the shirt is there. Why your clothes shrank with you, you have no idea, but you really wish that whoever did this to you had at least given you a decent pair of briefs. It's just plain mean to shove a college guy into woman's underwear after knocking him out. Then you go and shrink him, and then leave him somewhere.

So begins your quest. To find out who that girl was, and what made you shrink. Your only clues on this quest are the strange discoloration of a birthmark, and of course the pink, frilly panties. Just so mean. So where does your adventure begin?
1.title: Waking up

choices: The keg, maybe it can provide some more clues as to what happened
The table, so that you can try to get someones attention when they come down
The front door, it is possible that the people here are the ones responsible
Upstairs, try and get some help now
Anywhere with a john, you have to pee
11.content:
"This could be bad," you say to yourself as your vision finally begins to clear. Around you is the waste and decay left after any normal college party. Normally you would just walk away, and hope no one remembered that you were ever there. Of course this time that wasn't really an option as you were sitting in the middle of the floor with the mess towering over you like the Alps. The remains of food and drink surround you, and you can't help but feel intimidated.

Still it isn't really that bad. Obviously whoever lived in this house wasn't awake yet, or you'd hear some kind of booming footsteps, or the thundering voices of titans. As it was everything was calm and still as the first rays of the sun made their slow way over the wooden floor to where you had been passed out. How you'd ended up in the middle of the mess was yet one more of the mysteries you were going to have to try and solve as you attempted to get back to normal.

Collecting yourself you prepare for the long march over the blasted plain of discarded plates, overturned cups, and various other refuse. Over one particularly high mound of burger wrappers you are pretty sure you can see the keg you had a beer from last night, just before everything goes blank. Last night it had seemed that the small metal drum was far to small to quench the thirsts of all the partygoers, but this morning it looks like a mountain.

Of course there's a simple reason for that, but you try to ignore it. Thinking about your current size just makes it harder to keep going, as you can see left over bits of food that are bigger than you, and that thought doesn't sit well in your stomach. Looking over the mounds of garbage you spot some other interesting landmarks, including a table, the front door, and of course the stairs to the upstairs, from which there emanates the sound of at least three different sets of snores. Looking around you can't find anything else interesting, so looks like you've got four possible destinations, though you could try to think of others. Where are you headed?
11.title: The scene of the crime

111.content:
"The keg" you say to yourself thinking it might provide you with some clues since that was the last place you remember being at with...? but you cant seem to remember with whom,but your damn sure you weren't alone that you are sure of.

You begin your trek through the scattered trash and debris of the previous night's festivities.You pass by a half eaten burger and at your current size you get a really good look at the under cooked meat which turns your stomach.You make a mental note to give up junk food.As you near the table where the keg is sitting you realize that it's gonna take some work to get up to it.At normal size you would easily tower over it, but now it was like facing Mt.Everest and getting up to it was going to be a challange. As you stand there thinking of how to climb to it,out of the corner of your eye you see something move. You turn your head and see something large and white sticking out from behind the even larger sofa. You couldn't quite make out what it was exactlly. You begin to slowly move torward it. The closer you got the bigger it got.It moved again.You stopped and realized that the big white thing was a sock and in that sock was a foot which meant that you could get some help from whom ever it belonged to.You hoped.

You walked up to it but kept some distance between you and the massive thing that towered a good twenty feet above you.You walked around the right side of it carefully looking for the other one but you saw that it was tucked under the other leg. Now you had to see who it belonged to and unfortunately their back was turned to you so you had to walk all the way around to see the face. You slowly crept around the giant form not wanting to wake it till you were sure you would be safe.Just as you were about to come face to face with the sleeping giant you were distracted by the thunderous footsteps that were heading your way.Quickly you make a dash for under the sofa,and just in time to,because where you were standing just a second ago a huge barefoot came crashing down causing the floor beneath you to rumble. from your point of view you couldn't see the face of the giant but from the red painted toe nails on the huge foot that stood before you, you were sure it was a female.You hoped anyway,cuase then again you woke up in pink frilly panties.

"Charles wake up!" you heard a voice boom above you a female voice "come on we got to clean this place up before my folks get home"

Charles! you think to yourself the sleeping giant was one of your best friends who would certainly help you.You watch as a foot falls from out of nowhere and land on your friends back, then begins to shake him.

"Come on get up!" the giant girl says while she rocks him back and forth with the foot. But who is this girl you ask yourself. You poke your head out far enough to take a look up at her and are stunned to see it was.....
111.title: To The Keg You Go

1111.content:
You need to get the attention of your girlfriend, Anna. Charlie was no help as you realise that he passed out from the part from last night.

"Anna's got to help me." you said. as you leave the keg of the bottle."

That when it occurs that you don't know where to look and even if you do find her, there's a chance she's mistaken you for a doll or worse a bug and crush you. You don't have any other choice in the matter.

What do you do? Do you try to search the rooms for her or wait
1111.title: Anna

choices: You decide to brave the outdoors
You decide to go back farther inside and find a place to get noticed
113.content:
Sighing you begin to make your way over the junk littering the floor and move toward the front door. The trek is far from easy, though luckily whoever owns the house either fumigates regularly, or at least keeps the seals on the house tight, as despite the garbage, most of which consists of uneaten food and refuse of that sort, there are no bugs. This journey, hard as it is, would likely be even worse for you if you were to face off against a colony of ants or worse yet, a spider of some sort, anything of that genus likely as not to devour you, or drain your innards, neither of which really appeals to your sense of self preservation.

The walk is slow going as you marvel at the stuff around you, all of it so common that were you at your normal size you likely wouldn't have bothered with it. After all it's not your home, which is likely the train of thought that led to this mess in the first place, most of the stuff being things that would have been easily placed into a garbage bag, one of which you can see against the back wall behind the table, though it was probable none of the partygoers, yourself included, notice it during the festivities, the thing hanging limp and empty.

You turn away from that though. Moaning over the facts of your situation don't change them, and you really need to reach the door before someone in this house wakes up. You don't trust any of them not to have been involved with your current condition, and you can only guess as to why that is. There are some real sickos in the world. Perhaps one of them wanted to play a game with a tiny human. You'd seen pictures online of people doing some pretty creepy things with people who were in a situation very similar to your's. Women rubbing tiny humans against their slits, sucking them into their pussies, or others putting them on food stuffs, like pizza or burgers, and then proceeding to devour them whole and alive, not a fate you particularly relish.

Putting one foot in front of the other, you find your destination getting closer, though you are forced to backtrack more than once to get around a big gulp cup, or some discarded hamburger wrapper or the like. You even got stuck to a piece of pizza once, but were able to pry yourself off it using a piece of pepperoni, covering yourself with the smell of meat. Still, you finally reach your goal, and are happy, yet disturbed at the same time, to find that you have an easy way out, something you hadn't considered when you realized the house had to be shut up tight for there not to be bugs.

Your way out happened to be a doggie door, sealed with a bit of weather resistant foam at the side, and with some resin on it that smelled of poison to drive bugs away, though it was just a smell, rather than an actual poison, one of those new items on the market that were pet safe, yet kept them flea free. Of course, you are now faced with a new choice. The fact that the doggie door is open, and you haven't heard any sounds of a dog inside means it's likely the animal is outside. If you go out in your current state...well it's not like a dog to pass up a free treat. Of course, remaining inside might be just as bad if the people inside really had something to do with what happened to you. After a time you come to your decision, and act on it.
113.title: Garbage, Garbage Everywhere, and Not a Bite to Eat

1131.content:
Despite the fact that you don't want to end up in a dog's belly you don't really want to be in the house when everyone wakes up more. So you decide to risk becoming a tasty treat, and with a gulp you head outside through the doggy door. Once outside you look around and seeing no sign of the dog let out a sigh of relieve. However, you decide it would best to get out of the open, and so you start to make your way to the grass.

You're about halfway to the grass when a large booming sound made you stop in your tracks. Then a large shadow loomed over you, and a shiver ran down your spine. Slowly turning around you look up to see a large chocolate lab staring down at you. This must be the owner's dog you realize. Frightened you slowly try to back away, but the lab brings its nose so close to you that you are knocked flat on your bum. The dog then proceeds to start sniffing you. You hope against hope that the lab will lose interest in you, but then you remember, with a shudder, that you covered yourself in the smell of meat when you pried yourself off that slice of pizza with a piece of pepperoni. You no doubt smell like food to this dog.

"Nice doggy. Please don't eat me," you say, "Good doggy. Go away please."

Unfortunately, the dog doesn't listen to you. The lab proceeds to bring its tongue out and lick you, effectively covering you in saliva. Your eyes then widen in terror as you see the lab lick its lips.

"No," you mutter.

The lab opens its mouth and brings its tongue out once more.

"NNOOOO!" you scream as you're lapped up into its mouth.

Once inside the lab's mouth you become soaked in even more saliva and get blasted by its warm smelly breath. Then the lab proceeds to lick you against its palette and rolling you around on its tongue as it tastes you some more. You realize that the pepperoni must have also made you tastier as well as the lab continues to taste you. The lab savors your wonderfully delicious meaty flavor for several minutes. Eventually, the tongue settles down and you scream in terror as it starts pushing you towards the back of the throat. The lab tilts its head back and with a loud gulp swallows you whole. You now find yourself slowly travelling down the slimy and fleshy tunnel that is none other than the esophagus. As the rippling muscles slowly massage you down towards the stomach you become covered in mucus and even more saliva. You're filled with terror as the gurgles of the stomach become louder and louder, as if calling to you.

Soon your journey comes to an end as you bump into ring of flesh that opens up and allows you to fall into the stomach. You fall for a few seconds and land with a splash in nothing else but digestive juices. They waste no time in starting to digest you. You cry out in pain as you're slowly digested alive. Eventually you began to pass out from the pain. Your last thought before you pass out to never awaken again is about how you knew that going outside would result in you becoming a dog's tasty treat.
1131.title: A Dog's Tasty Treat

choices: I don't make it up the stairs.
114.content:
I opt for the stairs, at least I know someone is up there, maybe even my friend Charlie. He was at the party, I vaguely remember. In fact, he is the one who brought the keg.

Charlie showed up at our doorstep a week before the semester started, looking for a room to rent. My parents had extra rooms and always thought it was a good idea to have roomies. Charlie was OK, but just a slight bit off kilter. No one knows where he came from. He walked in the first day with some rambling bit about Volkswagen busses and free camping. Anyway, right now, Charlie was my best bet.

The staircase looms in the distance like a mountain range in the mist. How in the hell am I going to get all the way over there? The floor is littered with things too nasty to mention and I'd rather not think about their origins. It had been a kegger after all.

I take a deep breath and set off for the stairs. I sidestep an overturned plastic cup that started out the evening as a drink glass and ended up as an ashtray. Wow, now that is gross. The liquid dumped out is nicotine-brown, probably the way my teeth will look in couple of years if i don't quit. The smell is overwhelming and I almost lose it. Just what I want to do, contribute to the mess on the floor. I've got to keep it together and get up those stairs. If I don't get a move on people are going to start stirring and I am going to get squashed.

I am going to need a plan to get up those stairs. The first one is twice as tall as I am. I grab an empty cigarette pack and start pulling. This will work great to stand on, but I don't know if I will be able to pull it up to the next step. I grab the top of the pack and pull with everything I have--which isn't much; I'm hanging like a wrinkled curtain.

When I finally get the pack over to the stairs, I hear a strange noise. I jump up on the pack and grab the edge of the next step. The step is warn and smooth and I don't know if I will be able to grip it hard enough to pull myself up.

The noise is closer, and rhythmic. It sounds like someone rolling their fingernails on a table in boredom. Tic, tic, tic....tic, tic, tic. I stop trying to pull and turn just in time to see the little dog. Georgie. It looks as if he survived the party and was on his way upstairs. As he neared the first step he stopped and sniffed. Now how this dog smelled me with all of the spilled beer and stale cigarette reek is beyond me, but smell me he did. Thank God this was a small dog, otherwise I think he would have sucked me right up into one of his nostrils, shook his head and sneezed me out like so much snot.

But Georgie must have remembered me from last night and decided I was familiar. He was nice enough not to breathe, eat, or squash me and started on his merry way up the stairs. I realized this was my chance; this was the only way I was going to get up those stairs before I died of old age. I lunged forward and grabbed a chunk of Georgie's hair and hung on. Georgie stopped and turned slamming my head into the wall. I gripped with all my might, my vision wavering with nausea and dog hair. Georgie gave a little shake and I almost lost my grip. Finally I guess he decided I was along for the ride and he hopped to the next step sending me swinging over his back where I tightened my grip and held on for dear life.
114.title: The Stairway to Heaven?

choices: take the scenic rout around the house looking for the bathroom
Pee on the floor and move on (eeeewwwww)
115.content: But first thing in the morning after a party you find there is a need to try and locate a bathroom. It is a necessity, and even if there is no way you can actually reach the facilities at your present size there may be a floor drain somewhere. It may be a long hike as well so upon further contemplation there are only two real choices to make at the moment.
115.title: pressing need

12.content:
Okay, so maybe being small is a bad thing, but you really can't argue with the location. I mean, how many guys dream of sneaking into the sorority house on their campus, and here you are, sitting in the center of the hallway, with the rooms of the various girls laid out before you like a buffet. Whatever the circumstances this is an opportunity that most men would give their right testy for, and you get it for free.

Well, okay, the panties are a bit of a downer, but even they can't really damped you mood. The shrinking you can live with that for a little while at least. After all you can see under the doors of several of the girls, and you can't help but think that maybe you could stay like this for a while. Though you are going to try and get back to normal. After a little bit of fun. Okay maybe a few hours of fun. Looking down the hall you can see there is plenty of fun to be had.

Just to your right is a door marked with a large pink heart. Obviously Melissa's room, as she's the only girl you know who would go for a decoration that tacky. Just to the right of her door is one marked with a large keep out sign. Candy's room, defiantly, as the door, like the girl within, is painted so as to be black as night. Next is Anna's room, which you've been to only once, as she prefers to spend the night at you house, and just down the hall from her door is Lora's room, marked simply because it was the only undecorated door in the entire hall.

Beyond those four you can see at least half a dozen other rooms, which, as stated before, are all marked in some unique way. Looking down the hall you can feel a tightness in you pants, and are surprised that the panties, which you've decided not to remove until you find some replacement undies, stretch to fit, something a woman's underwear doesn't do. Or maybe it does, you've never worn panties before.

Shaking your head clear of such thoughts you look down the hall again to see the rays of dawn peeking from underneath the portals. Obviously you've been out most of the night, and in a few minutes the girls will start waking up. Before that happens you decide you want to be in one of heir rooms, if for no other reason then to get out of the high traffic hallway, which will soon be full of mammoth feet. Who's door do you head for.
12.title: The Good, the Bad, and the Voyeur

121.content:
Crawling under the door proves to be a minor inconvenience, as even though you are small, the gap between the door and floor is still enough to force you to get down on your hands and knees. At one point you even become stuck as the carpet, which you had been pushing apart as you crawl through it, suddenly becomes harder, refusing to yield to the strength of your micro sized body. Luckily with a bit of effort you are able to push your way through the region and at last emerge on the other side of the door, and into the confines of Anna's room.

Of course you've been in the room before, so you think you would know your way around, but standing on the floor, barely an inch tall, you can't help but feel overwhelmed by the perspective of everything. The dresser, sitting on one side of the room, had always seemed small to you, now towered above you like some monolith of an ancient civilization. So huge that you nearly fell on your ass as you tried to lean your head far enough back to see the top.

Shaking off the feeling of being dwarfed by the furniture you turn toward your real reason for being in the room. In a distant corner, well distant to you anyway, of the great cavern that is Anna's room slumbers the goddess herself, her breathe coming in low, almost hypnotic, gasps that you can't say you haven't heard before, though their tone is a bit lower than it was, probably due to your diminished stature.

Steeling yourself and pulling up your pants in a manner you remember seeing in some of those old cartoons and movies you start to make your way across the vast field of carpet towards the giantess who should be almost six inches shorter than you, though in the current circumstances she appears several hundred feet taller than you. Oddly you remember commenting last night at the party that you liked tall women, though if this was somebody's way of giving you your wish you wish they'd take it back, or at least give you some guys underwear.

The trek across the room proves faster than you would have expected, calling to mind the fact that in proportion everything you do at this size, from jumping, to breathing, to even eating, should be occurring at a higher rate. For a moment after reaching the edge of Anna's bed you try and see if you can notice a difference in your breathing at least, but several attempts to hold you breath or take deep gasps prove either that it hasn't changed, or that you are incapable of perceiving the alteration if there is one.

Of course getting to the bed of Anna is only the first part of your problem, as getting into that bed had always proved a problem at regular size, and certainly posed a conundrum at this height. Luckily before you are two ways to ascend the height of the mesa, and approach the goddess that lay atop. One is the bed sheet, which hangs just low enough for you to get to, while the other is in true storybook fashion, as one of Anna's hairs touches the ground nearby, looking like a fiery red tendril snaking its way into the heavens. Which do you climb?
121.title: Lair of the Giantess Girlfriend

1212.content:
Grabbing the follicle in your hands you do a test pull, hoping that maybe Anna would feel your small weight and awaken to investigate the small tug. Unfortunately she doesn't even seem to notice your minuscule addition to the weight of her hair, and continues to sleep high above you, her breathing becoming less regular as you listen to it, indicating that she will soon awaken unto the world, and hopefully to your presence.

With no recourse left you take the hair in both hands and being to climb, making sure that it wraps around one of your legs as you do so. This technique, a remnant of your three weeks in boot camp, insures that you won't fall to your death if something were to cause you to lose your grip for some reason. Of course the downside to that is that if you do fall it is highly probable that you will pull your leg out of its socket, causing an injury that would more than likely prove fatal in your current circumstances.

Ignoring that thought you make your way upward into the dizzying heights of your girlfriend's bed, something you'd been trying to do since you two had started your relationship. Having her come to your bed, which had happened, was one thing, but going to her's was something else entirely, and you'd been dropping hints for the last several weeks about this, most ignored or outright denied by Anna, who ‘liked her privacy' as she called it. If only she knew how much you were violating her privacy this morning.

These images, pleasant in their own way, are shaken from your mind when something occurs that you hadn't expect. Anna rolls over. This motion, minuscule to the young woman herself, propels you upward at a dizzying speed. Upon reaching the top of the bed you are quick to let go of the strand which afford you your ascent just as it gets tangled up in a mess of Anna's hair as she rolls back over, turning onto her back again.

Looking to the side you are lad you chose the hair over the bed sheet as the spot where you would have been is crushed by her tremendous back. Thanking your stars regarding the previous choice you are now faced with another. Over to one side of you lies Anna's body, specifically those two round hills on her chest, and the pleasure they would bring. Of course getting noticed might be better at this point, and thus Anna's face would probably be the better place to set off towards. Looking to the heavens, well ceiling, for answers you at last decide to head for Anna's...
1212.title: Living out a storybook tale

12121.content:
There will be plenty of time to get noticed later. After all you might never get another chance like this again in your entire life, as Anna or any other girl you know would be more than slightly concerned for your safety, and their privacy, if you tried something like this with their knowing. Without any other thought in hand you make your way towards Anna' chest, and the delight of those two huge mounds that adorned it.

Luckily there was just enough of a gap between her bed covers and he body to let you pass between the two, and into that tent like area that existed right next to her flesh. For a moment you just stand next to her body, touching it and feeling the warmth that flows through it. Listening you can hear the deep rumble of her breath, the beating of her heart, and from farther away the low gurgling sound that can only be her stomach.

Trying to ignore that last one you make your way down Anna's body, careful to listen for the slightest rustle, as she might at any moment turn over again and crush you without knowing it. Luckily her sleep seemed more restive now, and you make it to the area right next to breasts. Her nightgown collar, low cut like all her shirts, affords you the perfect rope to climb up and onto her chest, and slowly bring into view those parts of Anna which most men would die to touch.

Rushing across her firm yet soft flesh you literally slam into one of the things, and somewhere far below you can hear the sound of her giggling at your touch. The noise, which you would expect to be near deafening at your size, is much more subdued, and even slightly calming as you listen to it through the velvet like skin of her chest ornaments. The ground beneath you rises and falls to the rhythm of her breathing, which seems to almost perfectly coincide with the beating of her heart.

Moving around and keeping your hand on the hill you make your way around it, slowly getting in-between in and its twin. Looking at the two mounds you are dumbstruck, with nothing to say, though plenty you'd like to do, as evidenced by the front of you pants. Before you can though, something unexpected happens, and you are thrown forward, colliding with Anna's bra as she suddenly sits up, and let's out a huge yawn.

"ANNA!!!" you shout as you fall, but the giantess on whom you are now hanging doesn't hear you, her ears deafened by the act of yawning. Before she finishes though the wind is knocked from you as you impact her bra, hard, and your cry ends with a series of ragged gasps. Trying to catch your breathe you are hurtling upward as Anna rises to begin her day, the sun just barely showing through the window. Hanging on for dear life you are treated to the breast point of view as Anna walks out the door to her room and goes straight to the...
12121.title: Pleasure before work

choices: tub of bread, cheese, and various other things.
121212.content:
The woman you love does almost all her morning stuff before anyone else is even awake. A fact you remember from her stays in you own home during which she was up with the sun, something neither you, nor any of the people you lived with, did on a regular basis. The good thing was unlike most morning people, rather than starting her day off with a shower to revitalize and awaken her after a good night's sleep, which would have likely sent you to a watery grave, Anna instead began with the most important meal of the day.

Her footfalls, huge concussions to you, are probably inaudible to the other girls who were still asleep in their rooms, and were unlikely to awaken for an hour at least. This resulted in an almost silent house, a good thing for a mini-man who wanted to be noticed, as there was little to drown out the sound of your voice. Unfortunately your position in Anna's bra forced you to be more focused on keeping from falling to a very painful death, so much so that you can't waste the breath it would take to shout at Anna, and hopefully get her attention.

You try twice to kick at her breast, knowing that she is quite sensitive there, but the way you are hanging onto Anna's bra puts those lovely, fleshy bulbs just out of range, and when you try to get closer you are nearly knocked off your perch. After regaining you composure and your stability you at last decide that the best thing to do is probably to wait until Anna has at last sat down to enjoy her breakfast, then get her attention.

Luckily her dorm is only a single story and the kitchen isn't too far from Anna's room, a fact she said influenced her choice of rooms earlier in the year, being one of those people who liked to eat alone and at some of the most unusual times. Her belly growling far below you and her tongue licking those luscious red lips of her's she makes her way to the fridge. Looking in she sees a few options for a tasty breakfast and closes the door, and cuts off the cold air which nearly froze you.

Walking over to the cabinet, she gets out a skillet and sets it on the stove, pushing one of the knobs inward and turning it till a light came on indicating that the stove top was now on and getting hot. Satisfied with this she then makes her way back over to the fridge and grabs a gray tub you can see says butter on the side, laying it next to the stove. Then she turns back to the still open fridge, this time withdrawing a...
121212.title: Breakfast of Goddesses

1212121.content:
Unluckily for you in order to grab the tub out of the bottom of the fridge Anna is forced to lean down, and you nearly tumble from her bra right into it. You are just able to save yourself thought, turning in mid air to wrap your arms around the bra again. Now hanging from the outside you can't deny that any drop would be fatal as Anna's body, which might have caught you had you fallen while on the inside, was not going to be able to do it anymore, and the floor below looked harder than stone and easily able to reduce you to paste.

Looking up you wish you could wave your arms or shout at the titaness who has yet to even acknowledge her tiny passenger. This fact is in part probably due to the party the previous night, which you remember she was at too, and the fact that she hadn't eaten yet. Once she'd had breakfast Anna would come awake fully and then you would easily be able to get her attention. All you had to do was hang on.

In the mean time Anna set her tub of various things on the counter beside the butter and proceeded to open the butter and with draw a knife from one of the nearby drawers. Looking over your shoulder you watch in amazement as the Ziggurat sized knife moves over you vision, and a plain of white, surrounded by a brown wall was withdrawn from the tub. It took you a minute to figure out that the plain was a slice of bread, over which Anna was now spreading butter.

When that piece is covered Anna sets it un-buttered side down on the counter and quickly withdraws another from within the tub. She repeats he process of the first, making sure she creates a nice even coat of butter on the bread before flipping it over and placing it so that she creates a butter sandwich out of the two slices of bread. After this she walks over to the stove and holds her hand over the skillet she'd gotten out and set up before. Obviously satisfied with the temperature she walks over to the slices of bread again.

She then reaches into the bin, but before she can withdraw anything you feel her breathe catch in her chest, and a deep sound comes from somewhere in her core. This is promptly followed by another deep breath, with an even deeper accompanying sound, and Anna, in an age old gesture brings her hand up to her nose, and you realize that she's about to sneeze, as she begins to make the ah-ing sound people make just before doing this.

"Anna wait!" you yell as best you can, waving one hand up at her. As before she continues to be unaware of you, and with one last deep inhalation she let's off a huge sneeze, and sends a spray of stuff out of her mouth, and much more importantly, dislodges you from your position on her bra, flying forward. They look like your average family. The father is leading the group. Gripped in his left hand is a whicker basket, or at least you think it's a whicker basket. At your size it's hard to tell. You don't recognize the man, though his brown beard and thinning hairline seem familiar to you. Right behind him comes what you guess to be his wife. She, like her husband, is a titan of monolithic proportions. She towers high above you, pushing branches out of her face that are at least as thick as you are tall.

Her you know, you think. Her face is hard to see from an inch high perspective off the dirt path, but the brown-black hair, and the way she's swinging her hands makes you at least eighty percent positive that she is none other than Mrs. Amos, the English literature professor at the college you go to. That would make her husband Mr. Amos, one of the youngest who sits on the board of trustees. Considering that their still supposed to have a seven year age with Mr. Amos being the older, he looks pretty good.

Behind the two adults come what you have to assume are their children, though from your view all the people look a lot alike as you focus mainly on the size rather than on the faces. Right behind her parents, and holding her mother's hand is a little girl, probably no more than eight or nine, possibly even younger than that thanks to the age warping effects your perspective is having on the people you are looking at.

In the middle of the group of three children is a boy who looks to be about thirteen. Again the age is not really that easy to identify from on the ground, but you are pretty sure the kid is thirteen from the way he's looking around. He has the bored with life, yet still interested in the world look that only new teens can really master. His eyes are darting every which way, for a moment passing over you as you hop up and down, but then moving on to something else that catches his eye.

Bringing up the rear is a girl who is sixteen. This time you are certain, but only because you met Angela when you took Mrs. Amos' class last semester. The girl seems more apathetic to the world now than she did then, and that is quite a feat considering the girl appeared to be a statue during that day in class when her mom had to pick her up thanks to a bomb threat at the local high school. She's not even looking down, and as she passes you stop shouting and jumping, as it seems a waste of effort.

Looking after the family of titans you are faced with a choice. Follow them and hope to get some attention, or go back down the path which they were walking, as it obviously leads back to civilization, and hopefully someone who can get you big again. Or at least into another pair of undies.

You are again forced to grip the basket as hard as you can as the father quickly raises and lowers it, probably in a simple shrugging gesture. To you though it feels like an elevator suddenly going up and then going down, but after a second a gentle swaying motion ensues, and you get to look forward. Right ahead now walks Angela, but beyond her is a clearing in the woods that is obviously the destination of the family. As you break through the trees you see...
1341.title: Where's the picnic spot?

13411.content:
The place is pristine. Well as pristine as usual anyway. Really it is just a small picnic ground off from the main campus. It was built sometime back in the sixties, and since then has gone into disuse. You figured that no one came here anymore, but apparently you were wrong. Mr. and Mrs. Amos seem to know exactly where they are going, as do their kids, as demonstrated by the fact that Angela is in the lead, who sits down at the table and then stares at her family with a particular loathing.

Mr. Amos quickly reaches the same table and slides the picnic basket onto the table. Relieved that your roller coaster ride is over you let go of the wicker basket and fall to the table below. You take a moment to look around, but before you can even begin to get your bearings the table below you suddenly jumps. Dennis has hopped onto the other end of the table, causing your end to rise enough to fling the picnic basket into the air almost an inch.

Unfortunately your tiny body is much lighter than the basket, and so is thrown high into the air. As you arc into the sky high above you hear a slight ringing noise, which you can't identify, though if you had to make a wild guess you would say that it was coming from inside your pants. You don't have very long to think about it before your arc reaches its highest point, and you stop for a moment before plummeting to the ground below. Where do you land?
13411.title: Fly through the air with the greatest of ease

134111.content:
Tumbling through the air helplessly, you see that the basket has already been opened up. Suddenly, the basket seems to swallow you whole as you fall into the enormous chamber, impacting moments later on a huge plastic tarpaulin.

Struggling to your feet, you look down through the see-through surface and realize you've come to rest on the plastic wrap that is covering a bowl of potato salad.

You rise, dust yourself off, and prepare to get off the bowl of salad, but then pause; maybe the best thing to do is stay right where you are. When the bowl is removed from the basket, you're bound to be seen--and then you'll be able to get some help!

You prepare to stay where you are, when another thought crosses your mind--are these the best people to help you? Mr. and Mrs. Amos are nice enough, but you're not sure that the kids are going to be helpful--and you don't know who will be tasked with unpacking the basket.

Maybe you'd best hide in the basket for now.

Decisions, decisions....
134111.title: Two Points!

1341111.content:
You hide in the salad you hear a voice say "Did we pack a salad?" then you see a woman's reaching in to grab a salad.

who is it.........
1341111.title: Hiding in the salad

choices: A hand grabs the shaker, you too
1341112.content:
Realizing that perhaps being seen isn't your best current option, you slide off the salad bowl and onto the botom of the basket. Looking around at the massive picnic supplies around you, you try to formulate a plan.

Pacing around, your thoughts are interrupted by an enormous hand decending from above. It pulls the salad bowl from the basket, proving you right. Had you remained, who knows what might have been. Leaning against a massive salt shaker...
1341112.title: Basket Full O' Fun

13411121.content: Another hand reaches into the basket and grabs both you and the salt shaker. You are suddenly hit with a case of vertigo as the hand lifts you up at an amazing rate, to you. The only part of your body that is not being held by the giant hand is your head and the very bottom of your toes. Being held like that you get a glimpse of who is holding the shaker and it turns out to be...
13411121.title: Shaker Vertigo

134111212.content:
The thirteen year old boy. He isn't looking at you, so he doesn't see that you aren't food. He opens his mouth, as he drops his teeth and compacts your body.

Your blood drips out of his mouth.
134111212.title: The 13 yr old boy

134112.content:
Flying has never been something you enjoyed much. Still flying without a plane just out and out sucks. Considering your only about and inch tall the landing should hurt. Hell, hurt nothing it should kill you. Even a foot drop should be enough to turn you into a little smear, and you are more than a little sure that your flight was higher than a foot. Probably something like three or four. Yet you land on the grill with a dull, clink.

You hang for a moment over the bar of the grill, your armpits hooked over the bar and holding you over the bottom of the fire pit. Looking over at the table you can only guess that some random act of fate stopped you from getting your arms ripped off and then breaking every bone in your body as you slam into the metal bottom of the grill. As it is you are mystified by what just happened. You are so mystified in fact that you don't hear any booming, and your first warning that something is up is when a shadow falls over you.

At first you have some hope that one of the family saw your little flight and is coming to investigate, but that illusion is quickly dispersed as you look up to find Mr. Amos standing over you, a bag of charcoal in hand, and unfortunately for you, his head turned towards his family though what he's saying you can't hear. You don't understand why, but then you don't get that much time to care as the ground under you suddenly begins to move and rumble.

With a grinding sound the rust covered hinges give to Mr. Amos, and the grill pops up, but thanks to the way your holding on you don't go flying, and instead just slide down the length of the iron rod, until you slam into the wall. Looking over towards the titanic form of Mr. Amos affords a view of coal being dumped into a grill, and then the hiss and smell of lighter fluid as he crushes the can between his hands. As if that weren't enough to knock you out the man quickly strikes a match and tosses it among the black boulders. Setting them ablaze in crimson glory.

Trying to claw your way up onto the bar, and thus away from the flames, only seems to draw the fast rising pillars towards you, and soon your entire world is blackened by the smoke coming off of the coal. Unable to see you are taken completely by surprise when the world slams down again, and you are sent up on a short hop, before coming down on some grainy, gravely red surface that smells strangely of blood.

It doesn't take you more than a hundredth of a second to realize that you are on a hamburger patty sitting on a grill. It takes you even less time to realize that the shadow above you , with holes of light shining through it, is a spatula. Again you hear a slight ringing sound, though this time you ignore it for the more ‘pressing' matter at hand.

"No, Mr. Amos! Don't! I'm down here!!!" you cry out towards the giant wielding the metal tool, but over the hiss and roar of the flames, and the chatter of his own family, Mr. Amos doesn't hear your pathetic squeak. With a crushing force the spatula pushes you into the hard, yet somehow malleable surface below you. Understanding your predicament you make a grab for one of the holes in the smooth metal, and when it rises again you are...
134112.title: Surprised not to be dead, but you might be soon

1341122.content:
"Well, this sucks," you say to yourself as the spatula, flies into the air. Your situation is pretty dang bad at this point, as you find yourself jammed into a burger patty with only your head slightly exposed. You can tell the rest of your body is caught cause you can feel the weight on you everywhere, like some kind of full body workout suit. Thinking about it you can't even begin to guess how a frozen piece of meat was still soft enough to push you into it, but you don't really care either, as how you got in is much less important that how you get out.

At first you try and rip yourself free of the patty, but find that it is like a roach trap. It let you in easy enough, but it has a death grip that won't let you go without one hell of a fight. Still for your life you are very prepared to put up such a fight and begin to pull at your legs and arms, trying to burst out of prison you find yourself in. You don't know how long this goes on, but you begin to feel more than a little warm after awhile, and then a shadow passes over you again.

At first you are afraid it might be Mr. Amos moving to press on the burger again, but you find out in a second that it is much worse than that, as the spatula moves under the burger, and then with a speed you can't believe you fly in the air again, and then slam down onto the grill with so much force that your afraid you might really rip out of your bonds, and fall right into the blazing inferno that is raging below you.

Luckily, or unluckily as the case may be, your prison stays solid, and you look down onto the flames for a second before one leaps to try and burn your face off. This time you are defiantly lucky, as somewhere above you Mr. Amos pushes the burger, and your face, instead of staring over the open pit of flames, is now staring at the hot iron of the grill. Gazing upon it you can't help but feel that you should be hotter than you are.

You are sweating quite a bit. It feels like whole buckets of the salty stuff have poured from your skin, yet you really can't feel a burn on your body, while all around you the once red burger is slowly turning a nice black, and smelling quite good. It takes you a minute to realize what your last thought was, and then begin shouting again at the giant wielding the spatula. As before he doesn't hear you, and continues to converse with his family, but over the roar of the flames you can't make out what he's saying.

Without any warning at all your view of the dull iron bar is replaced by a slick and sheen silvery kind of metal. The spatula then lifts up towards you, and you can actually see your own reflection in it as the world seems to move like a rocket straight up, and then suddenly dips back down. Hoping for something to get you out of this mess, you are disappointed when the spatula pulls back, and reveals that you are now sitting face down inside a burger. Outside you can hear voices, the closest one is the voice of...
1341122.title: You've been cooked, yet you aren't burned

choices: Take a bite that contained you whole
Chewing right through you, cutting you in half
13411221.content:
The closet voice to you is a mature feminine one, of Mrs. Amos. You are currently stuck inside the burger patty, with only your face out. Right in front of your face there's a bottom burger bun, and you're somewhere in the middle.

"Oh you've already put my burger on the bun? Hehe you know I like to assemble it by my own honey." You heard Mrs. Amos saying.

Then you felt movement upwards as the patty with you was lifted from the bun and put down again on the plate, this time you were facing up as she flipped the burger by mistake. You saw her gigantic face looking straight at you with hungry smile. Your own face appeared burned a little and blended well with the patty texture, so there was no chance that she will see you. Also, by now you've realized that any shouting won't make any difference.

"No!! Please don't eat me!! Please! I don't want to be your food!" you wanted to scream but there was no point. Mrs. Amos saw only a delicious burger in front of her.

She gathered the ingredients and started assembling the hamburger to her liking. First, she spread some mayo on the bottom bun. Then added some lettuce and tomato slices on top of that. She grabbed the patty, this time keeping you face up and put it on the tomato slices.
The next thing you saw was her hands around a red bottle with open white cap right above you. She gave a squeeze and squirted ketchup all over the patty and on you. Some got in your eyes and inside your mouth. you blinked few times to clear your eyes just in time t see a slice of cheese covering you. The cheese blocked all your vision and now all you could see was ketchup and a yellow screen. You felt some mor pressure and guessed she added some pickles or something, but you couldn’t tell for sure. At last she put on the top bun and gave a press that squashed you a bit.

"That’s it, this is how I'm gonna end, as some burger add in being eaten by one of my teachers" you bitterly thought.

All the while you heard the noises around you, the family members chatting, some commented that their burger is good, some just talk on this and that. They were living their lives, having a good time and a delicious meal while your life were about to end soon, maybe chewed inside her mouth, maybe swallowed whole and digesting alive in her stomach.
Your one and only consolation was that Mrs. Amos is the one who will eat you, she was good looking for her age, and good looking in general. You preferred that if it must come to that, and in the situation you found yourself in, out of the five people present she was the least worst the be eaten by. Much better option than her husband or boy or her bratty daughter.

Then suddenly out of the blue, while you drenched in the thoughts about the last moments of your life, you felt her hands grabbing the burger and bringing it close to her mouth. you wish that you could see something but you were stuck in the middle.

You felt a great squeezing pressure and you assumed she took a bite somewhere below your legs. She hasn't got to you yet.
"MMMMmmmm.. this is amazing!" You heard her saying while chewing a mouthful of the burger.
You wondered what will happen next as she…
13411221.title: On the plate of Mrs. Amos

134112212.content:
After the first bite, you become really terrified. You just wanted the nightmare to end. You knew that for some reason, while shrunk like this you were more durable than you should. Alas, there must be a limit to how much you can endure, and you were about to find out.

In the next bite you felt something hard brushing off your foot. Her teeth just touched your foot but haven't bitten it off yet. Your foot could be seen new inside the patty, you felt the cool fresh air on it.
"Maybe she'll see it and realize there's something extra in the burger, maybe I'll be saved!"
You hoped.

There were two more bites somewhere in the burger that were near you but didn't touch you. Your heart was pounding fast as you braced for the inevitable.

A great pressure is applied on your entire body, squeezing the meat's juices and the ketchup into you. The teeth came from above and below at the same time right on your crotch and ass, catting you in half in a swift motion. The pain was immense and you screamed in agony.

Mrs. Amos continued to chew her last bite. "HMMMMmmmm.. WOW! That burger is amazing! Honey, did you put something special inside?" she asked her husband.
"Well you know, just my love."
"Hehe, this is absolutely delicious!" Mrs. Amos replied, talking with her mouth full of hamburger and you lower body half.
You were agonizing. Sitting stuck in there, missing half of your body. You lost it in favor of some extra good taste for your beautiful teacher. While you were in pain, crying knowing that you are not going to recover from this, she was in delight.

As you wondered what will come next, and if she will look inside her burger to see something strange, the great bite pressure came again. The pressure point was near your head ad this time her teeth cut right on top of it, sliding on the cap. The rest of the burger was moved back and you inside that bite stayed inside her mouth.

Inside her mouth was hot and damp. The smells were terrible. You could smell her breath, and the strong food taste. It was like being inside a bubble made of burp. The sugary coke that she sipped between bites made the smells and stickiness even worse. She pressed the bite with her tongue, savoring the taste, and spread it to the sides so the teeth could start their work.

Your entire world started to spin, twist, and sloshed around. Your senses were overwhelmed by biting pressure, strong smells of burger, ketchup, and burp, and tastes. The entire mush mixed with her saliva, coating your entire upper body, forcing itself inside your mouth, nose, and ears.
You felt her tongue sloshing you around, drowning you with saliva and chewed mush. At one point you were laying face on it and Mrs. Amos just enjoyed your taste.
"MMMM.. MMMM.. YUMMY!!" her voice boomed, almost causing your ears to explode.

Cranck! One of your hand just got bitten off. "At least I'm not dying for nothing, at least I'm providing her with nutrients and my great taste" you thought.
The other arm soon followed.

You were lost between the chewed mush of meat, ketchup, tomatoes and the rest of the burger, and her saliva, the strong stinky smells, her soft wet tongue, all inside her warm mouth.
You almost haven't noticed that your head came laying on a hard surface. You have just come to a realization of what's coming when her upper teeth came down on your face, crushing your nose inside first then continue flattening your head to add it to the rest of the mush.

Mrs. Amos savored the taste of you chewed body and hamburger before swallowing. Your remains arrived at her stomach second later, landing at the pool of digesting acids, chewed food and coke.

You never found out why you have been shrunk, and couldn't get back to normal size, but you did find out that you are very tasty on a burger. At least your death was somewhat meaningful, you could have just get being stepped on by mistake.
134112212.title: Chewing right through you, cutting you in half

choices: He notices the bug in his burger
13411222.content:
All around you you could suddenly hear the voice of a young man.You listened but all you could make out was, "This looks delicous!" Then there was sudden upwards motion as the hold world was moved up, and then gently carried for a while. Then out of nowhere, you feel yourself falling. "Oh No!" you think, "I'm on the plate of that boy I saw earlier!" You think about how horrible it would be to become a part of anybody's lunch, not just a teenage boy you've only seen once. You still can't see anything, because your face is pressed into the bun under you. Despite not seeing anything, you knew you were doomed as the boy prepared his hamburger. You heard the bottles squirting there contents onto the meat. Some ketchup even seeped down onto you, and made it harder to breathe.After the boy had put on all his condiments, he took the top of the bun, and pressed it onto the hamburger. You were being crushed between a hamburger patty, and bread, not something you ever thought would happen to you! This thought stopped suddenly though, as you heard a deep gurguling. You realized with horror, "Must be his stomach!" you shuddered at the hoplessness of the situation, you were about to be eaten by a monstrously huge teenage boy for lunch, and end your life in that gurgulling stomach! There wasn't a worse fate you could imagine.

Suddenly it all came true, as the world was moving upward again. This is it, he was eating the burger with no way to know you were in it. You feel some pressure and a slimy white wall comes crashing through the roof and floor of your prison. You realize that wall is the front teeth of the enormous young man. You were spared in the first bite, but you probibly won't last a second. Your head is freed from the meat and bread and you are able to look around your surroundings a little.You see the giant face of the boy, and watch his mouth rytmically chew the wad of hamburger to mush. Then you see his adam apple bob as he swallows his first bite. He grabs a drink of soda, and washes it down. "Oh no!" you think, "This is it! I have one chance to get his attention, or I'll end up as his lunch!" You break your arms free and frantically wave them around as you shout "NO!!! PLEASE DON'T EAT ME!!!!"
13411222.title: Welcome to the picnic

choices: Try pulling yourself free of the burger
134112221.content:
The boy, licking a stray bit of ketchup off his upper lip, doesn't hear the minuscule screams of the extra bit of meat, you, in his burger, and without a pause of break he brings it to his mouth. Opened wide you stare into that cavern of doom as little pillars of saliva flow from the top to the bottom, or the bottom to the top depending on which pillar you're looking at. In between the boys teeth you can see bits of his previous bite, and in the dark recesses of the cave you can just make out the wall that is his throat as it seems to gape open in anticipation of the arrival of more food.

The boy obliges his throat, shoving the burger, you included, into his maw. Instantly you are hit by the change in atmosphere as his hot breath covers you, causing you to sweat again almost as badly as you had when you were being cooked. The saliva tendrils look like cables to you as the hamburger is shoved against them and you foolishly hope they might in some way stop the boy from getting his meal all the way into his mouth, but the rope like spittle breaks easily as the burger presses deeper into the darkness, and you are looking right down that abyss here you can just make out the sounds of sloshing water, or rather acid.

That last thought is punctuated as the boy lets out a small belch, probably totally unknowingly, but that little rise of air from his stomach is nearly enough to turn your's as the smell of partially digested meat, grains, and various plants comes to meet you nose. You used to clean the litter box at your house, so you know what stink is when you smell, and this is worse than all the cat litter boxes in the world put together, and you wonder if the boy would notice if you vomited into his throat right now.

Not that it matters as from somewhere behind you, you hear a sound like something you'd expect at an auto junkyard from a car crush. Doesn't take a genius to figure out that the boy is finally tearing into his latest bite of burger, and if he finishes you are going to be inside his mouth when he begins that first important step on the digestive process known as ‘chewing your food'. You have little doubt that if you don't do anything right now, little shredded bits of you are going to be falling down into the boy's stomach in a few seconds.
134112221.title: Joinning the picnic, as part of the menu

choices: Let go and hope the boy chokes
Hold on and try to get out of his mouth
1341122212.content:
Shouting at your size has yet to attract any attention at all, and seeing as how you are now inside an enclosed space, buffered by soft walls, you doubt your voice is going to be heard now either. This means your only recourse is to extract yourself from this situation and hope that somehow you are able to avoid not only getting ground into a mushy paste but that you are also able to get out of the boy's mouth before he swallows.

The first problem seems the worst as you push against your beefy prison with your arms, which you realize might send you plummeting into the vortex of the boy's throat. Luckily for you the boy's previous bite had sifted the hamburger patty, of which you were a part, around, causing several chunks that once held you to fall away easily. With grunts of effort, and a bit of kicking with your legs, you are able to create a kind of hole in the patty, allowing you to begin pulling yourself out of the burger so you can effect your escape.

While your doing this, though, Dennis, the boy who is at this time attempting to add you to his diet, is not sleeping. His slicing teeth are at last able to tear off a bit of his burger, and he closes his mouth completely, savoring for a moment the taste of real flame burnt meat. His savoring is a problem for you as he uses his tongue to shift the bite around, nearly causing you to fall straight down into his stomach, but with a monumental feat of strength you hold, and realize that if you but wait a moment you can ride his bite t the front of his mouth, away from his throat.

Of course if you do ride this bite of burger you might end up atop one of his molars, with little hope of extracting yourself before he brings the top set down. Since neither of these two scenarios is appealing to you, you stop to think for a second, and figure that you have a sixty-six percent chance of getting chewed if you stay where you are. On the other hand there is a one hundred percent chance of getting swallowed if you let go, but in getting swallowed there is a fifty-seven percent chance you might cause the young Amos boy to choke. Looking around you know you have only a moment to decide, before Dennis takes it out of you hands.
1341122212.title: Looking down in the mouth

choices: open wide enough to let you pass into his stomach
throw you up and out of his body
13411222121.content:
Thinking about how much it would hurt to be ripped apart by those huge teeth you can just see on the side of the burger, you decide to make a jump for it. After all you are an inch tall, and you know people have choked on things as small as a pea before. If you can just get your arms and legs out you should be able to cause enough of a block to get the boy to start coughing to dislodge you, hopefully spitting you out.

Your hastily thought out plan is put into action just in time as Dennis' tongue moves the burger you were sitting on forward in his mouth and begins chewing it into mush. Your last view of it in the oddly bright mouth of the boy is as the part you were actually gripping but a second ago being crushed between the back most pair of white rocks, leaving little doubt that you would have been reduced to a bloody heap had you remained on it.

An instant later you fall into the boy's oddly roomy esophagus. For a moment you are afraid you over estimated your size, and that you might just be able to fall straight into the boy's stomach, but luckily his throat senses you just in time as one of your shoes brushes against it, and it catches you in its tight grip. In fact he grip is so tight that your arms and legs, which you had been holding as far out as possible, were painfully forced back toward you body, and you hear an odd buzzing sound that you think might be caused by the pain, though you could swear you've heard it before.

Another instant passes and the throat walls begin to drag you down, forcing you to admit that even though you are an inch tall the boy might be able to still swallow you whole. You know you fell quite a ways down, and that you will reach his stomach, and death, in only seconds if nothing happens. Luckily for you something does happen as the esophagus suddenly comes to the spot where it meets the lungs and it finds it can't expand enough to allow your passage, causing Dennis to start coughing and choking, and you feel yourself rising with each earth shaking concussion, moving once more toward his mouth.

"Dennis, are you okay?" comes Mrs. Amos' voice, oddly distorted as it translates down the boy's throat. Looking up you can see straight to the top of his throat, and the light streaming in indicates that his mouth his open, and empty now, as he continues to cough.

"Son, do you need a little help?" asks Mr. Amos, who, unknown to you, walks up behind his son. A second passes and then a huge impact jars Dennis' body as his father smacks the boy's back with his palm. This impact causes Dennis' esophagus to...
13411222121.title: Choking on his meal

choices: Try attacking the walls of the boy's stomach
134112221211.content:
Feeling the strike of Mr. Amos' palm inside Dennis you are nearly at the top of his throat, and can just begin to smell the fresh air, when the walls around you suddenly loosen, and the light over head is cut off as Dennis closes his mouth. A brief, frozen moment passes as you feel the whole world tilt, indicating that you were inside his neck, as Dennis tosses his head back and gives a powerful swallow, sending you back down again.

::GULP!:: The sound comes from all around you like the death knelling of a church bell in one of those old World War II documentaries. This time nothing stops you as you slide down deeper into Dennis, and you wish you could scream out, but the pressure of the walls around you is just great enough to keep you from taking any more than a swallow breath as you pass down into the center of the body of the teenage boy.

Suddenly your descent is stopped as you feel your feet stand atop some firm bit of floor, which you quickly identify as the muscular ring that controls passage into the stomach. For a moment you have a hope that maybe you are still too big for it, but this is proven in correct as it slowly sucks in your feet, causing you to feel like your body is in a vice. Then you find yourself kicking as your feet emerge into an open chamber and you are having your ribs broken by the pressure of ring as it squeeze your torso through.

At last only your head remains, and you look up the fleshy tube of Dennis' throat one last time as it constricts, blocking off the outside world, and trapping you inside this hellish cavern of flesh. With a popping sound your head makes it's way through the ring and into the chamber below. For a brief instant you are in freefall, before impacting into a pasty goo that is mixed up with a liquid that you can see bubbling and frothing everywhere it has touched something.

The whole process of getting down Dennis' throat probably took only a few seconds, though to you it was an eternity, and as you sit on the pile of mush and goo the whole cavern, or rather stomach though you refuse to think of it in that term, shifts to one side as Dennis leans forward, breathing heavily. All around you the walls move in and out to the rhythm of the howling winds which you can hear above, and you impact the wall of the stomach as you slide over the rough textured, yet slick stomach floor.

Inside Dennis completely now you can hear the beating of his heart as well as his breathing, and somewhere outside you can hear other sounds, probably the voices of his family asking if he's alright, but over the workings of his body you can't make out anything of their muffled speech. You think you hear Angela say the word dork, but that might just be you hearing things, and at last your prison rights itself up as Dennis returns to his sitting position, and in a moment he will probably also return to his meal, which has already got his stomach churning, creating pools of acid which will eventually consume you if you don't do something, fast.
134112221211.title: Who didn't see this coming?

choices: You keep growing, and the boy starts feeling nauseous.
You stop growing and shrink back to 1 inch again.
1341122212112.content:
Today isn’t a very good day for you. First, you got shrunk to the height of an inch by some magical hijinks and woke up in a middle of the forest, wearing a girl’s underwear. Then you nearly become tiny BBQ on a griller with some burger patty. Next, you got eaten by your teacher’s son. You choked him, and he swallowed you (with the help of a few mighty pats on the back). And now you are in his stomach, being more miserable than ever before. The pink, velvety and incredibly wrinkly organ is as big as a large cavern. There is no way to reach the pyloric sphincter, and acid is being sprayed in the air like a mad scientist’s garden sprinkler. Clouds of smelly, greenish fumes from the digestion of Dennis’s food fill the air, giving you a hard time to breathe and a plenty of coughing and gagging. You choke him with yourself, so he chokes you with deadly acid mist. Neat. And it’s hot. The crazy Finnish sauna kind of hot. All the heat generated from his working body, the enzyme breaking down pieces of his delicious burger, and the acid burning on your skin is driving you mad. Dennis’s stomach recovered quite fast from the shock of being nearly choked to death and is now kicking its gear in digesting the teen’s meal. You can barely stand at all. Every time you managed to get on your legs, his belly churns violently, knocking you down and shaking everything up like a giant mixer of death. Dennis doesn’t stop at the burger. He keeps eating and drinking, shoving more and more food into his black hole of a mouth and rain apocalypse onto the poor tiny little human inside his belly. Teenagers. Their growing body consumes more food than a hungry dinosaur. From the top of the gigantic organic cave you are in, boulders of chew-up burger buns and patty descend from the sky. They don’t hit too hard, but they struck the murky surface strong enough to make you lose your balance even more. And to make the matter worse, every now and then, he burps. And every time he burps, his stomach turns into a battlefield that has just been struck by an A-bomb, minus the flaming light that melts your eyes. His burps melt your eardrums instead. The shockwaves generate from those burps shook the stomach so much that you swear a tsunami of melting food was formed inside his belly. If there is any place that can be called hell, it is the stomach, and we are should be thankful that we can’t get into this hell, as we carry it inside our body every day.
